mapper.select: select prental_id, prental_de, prtime_schedule, user_id, c.croom_id, c.croom_name from prental_info INNER JOIN classroom c on prental_info.croom_id = c.croom_id where c.croom_id = #{croom_id} and prental_de = #{prental_de}::date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prental_info prental_de, prtime_schedule, user_id, croom_id VALUES(#{prental_de}::date, #{prtime_schedule}, #{user_id}, #{croom_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * from studyroom order by sroom_seat_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.sroom_rental_info (sroom_rental_stime, sroom_rental_etime, user_id, sroom_seat_id) VALUES(now(), #{sroom_rental_etime}, #{user_id}, #{sroom_seat_id})
